text: The system for appointing judges to the Supreme Court is quite complex. Only a lawyer with years of experience could understand it. But trust me – this President has no right to make an appointment! We’ll let the people decide in the next election, as demanded by our Constitution!!
Don’t bother reading the Constitution, it’s only for smart people like me. Trust me – the President is way out of line to think the Senate has any obligation to give his candidate a hearing!
